item.title: 10 Common Software Architectural Patterns in a nutshell
item.description: An architectural pattern is a general, reusable solution to a commonly occurring problem in software architecture within a given context. Architectural patterns are similar to software design pattern but have a broader scope. Link

item.title: 101 Design Patterns & Tips for Developers
item.description: In software engineering, a design pattern is a general repeatable solution to a commonly occurring problem in software design. A design pattern isn’t a finished design that can be transformed directly into code. It is a description or template for how to solve a problem that can be used in many different situations. Link

item.title: 11 Best AI Tools for Web Designers
item.description: Let’s consider some other benefits of AI tools for web designers, check out their shortcomings and limitations, and examine 11 of the best solutions in this niche that already help creatives make the web a better place with outstanding, high-end, and inspiring web designs done with AI assistance. Link

item.title: 12 Python Decorators to Take Your Code to the Next Level
item.description: Python decorators are powerful tools that help you produce clean, reusable, and maintainable code. Link

item.title: ChatGPT With Your Docs | Full Tutorial WITH Code Examples
item.description: In this video, we are joined by Harrison Chase, founder of LangChain. LangChain is a popular open source library focused on making it easier to build AI features and applications, specifically focused on integrating GPT and other language models. Link

item.title: Custom langchain Agent & Tools with memory
item.description: We will build a web app with Streamlit UI which features 4 Python functions as custom Langchain tools. Our agent will also have a short term conversational memory. Link

item.title: From Prompt Alchemy to Prompt Engineering: An Introduction to Analytic Augmentation
item.description: This article will introduce the concept of analytic augmentation, a prompt engineering metholodogy that can be used to improve the factual results of LLMs and limit hallucinations. Link

item.description: These installation steps for unstructured enables document loader to work with all regular files like txt, md, py and most importantly PDFs. Link

item.title: How to use server-sent events (SSE) with FastAPI?
item.description: Server-sent events (SSE) is a way to send data to the browser without reloading the page. This allows you to use streaming data and build real-time applications that can be used in a variety of scenarios. Link

item.title: HugNLP
item.description: HugNLP is a novel development and application library based on Hugging Face for improving the convenience and effectiveness of NLP researchers. The founder and main developer is Jianing Wang. The collaborators (programmers) are Nuo Chen and Qiushi Sun. Link
